title: Writing Narrative Essays and Personal Stories

vocab.definition: A story that tells about events in the order they happened
A true story about something that happened to the writer
The exact words characters say in a story, shown with quotation marks
The order in which events happen
Words that help connect ideas and show the order of events

teachingNotes: Teach students to use time order and transition words. Practice writing personal experiences with vivid details. Emphasize beginning, middle, and end structure.

sample.question: What type of writing tells a story in the order events happened?
